author: mpetrunic
content: There is also reduced attack surface with sse as it's one way communication as oppose to websockets and it doesn't require additional libraries as it's much simpler protocol

author: paulhauner
content: FWIW we have an implementation of an SSE endpoint that serves updates to the head. We added it to see how hard it would be, in anticipation of this spec. It wasn't hard.
